dmca.title: Copyright infridgement
dmca.body:
nc


-----Original Message-----
From: amhlumsl@stonline.sk [mailto:amhlumsl@stonline.sk] On Behalf Of
Vilords media
Sent: Saturday, July 09, 2005 5:31 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Copyright infridgement

Dear Planet,

We found out one of your clients is illegaly reselling larger amount of our
products.

Their website url is sitetemplates.biz.

Be so kind and check our unique collection (all our products are registered
thru c-site and done inhouse):
http://www.designload.net/show/611/index.html
http://www.designload.net/show/616/index.html
http://www.designload.net/show/617/index.html
http://www.designload.net/show/602/index.html
http://www.designload.net/show/976/index.html


Check the same stolen products at their website:
http://www.selftemplates.biz/selftemplates/detalii_produs.php?id=450
http://www.selftemplates.biz/selftemplates/detalii_produs.php?id=455
http://www.selftemplates.biz/selftemplates/detalii_produs.php?id=456
http://www.selftemplates.biz/selftemplates/detalii_produs.php?id=458
http://www.selftemplates.biz/selftemplates/detalii_produs.php?id=616

I would appriciate if you could contact your client and ask them to 
remove these products as they are
unwilling to cooperate. Piracy is not acceptable.

We already contacted our lawyer regarding this issue, and we'll do all 
necessary steps when matter
not resolved.

Thanks for understanding.

regards,
Jan Kalvan
Authorizations and Security
Vilords media Inc.
